author: Pjulicher
title: Avarage all the way
review:
Box/Instructions

Coming in a polybag, instruction tiny folded but easy to follow.

Parts

54 bricks and 3 extra. Bricks are regular ones.

Minifigures

1 included with nice accesories: Finish flag and Lap sign.

The build

Easy to build, nothing special.

The completed model

The set consists of 2 seperate items, a finish line and a podium. the finish line remains unstable after built, if not placed on a larger base plate. Top and bottom parts come apart very easy. Podium is built on 2 quarter round plates, making it stable on all surfaces. The scale of the 2 items seems to differ. Set relies on stickers for enhancing layout.

Overall opinion

Avarage set, but fits nicely with the other polybags in the Shell/Ferrari promo.
